name: AOA Dx
headline: Blood Test for Early Detection of Ovarian Cancer
description: AOA Dx is developing the next frontier in early-stage cancer detection for women through our pioneering work in glycolipids and proprietary biomarker technology.

founders.name: Oriana Papin-Zoghbi, Founder
founders.description: CEO & Co-Founder AOA Dx Inc. Passionate about Women's Health.

founders.name: Alex Fisher, Founder/COO

generated_description:
**AOA Dx: Pioneering Early Detection for Ovarian Cancer**

Founded in 2020 and based in Denver, Colorado, AOA Dx is on a mission that truly matters: developing blood tests for the early detection of ovarian cancer. With a robust team of 25 professionals, this innovative company emerged from Y Combinator’s Batch S21, signaling a strong foundation in startup excellence.

At the heart of AOA Dx’s approach are two groundbreaking technologies: GlycoLocate™ and AKRIVIS GD™. GlycoLocate™ leverages a multi-omics platform to provide insights that could fundamentally change how we detect cancer at its earliest stages. On the other hand, AKRIVIS GD™ is a unique blood test that combines artificial intelligence with these novel biomarkers to pinpoint early-stage ovarian cancer, harnessing the power of lipidomics.

The founder’s ambition is palpable: create impactful and cost-effective medical technologies that transition from theoretical research to practical applications for patients and healthcare providers alike. This isn't just about innovation for the sake of it; it’s about saving lives and improving the quality of care for women facing the risk of ovarian cancer.

If you’re passionate about transformative health technologies, a career with AOA Dx could be a pivotal chance to make a difference. The company is actively looking for team members who are committed to elevating women’s health standards.

There’s a sense of urgency in what they're doing; after all, early detection can be the difference between life and death. Keep an eye on AOA Dx not just as a company, but as a potential game-changer in the healthcare diagnostics landscape.

For more details, visit their website at [AOA Dx](https://www.aoadx.com/).
